website_summaries.verdict: A quality portable air conditioner that looks good, doesn't take up an extreme amount of space, and offers 10,000 BTUs of power.
pros: Produces cool air straight away and is suitable for small to medium-sized living spaces
Controls on the unit and remote are straightforward to use
Also has fan and dehumidifier modes
cons: May not fully cool large rooms

customer_reviews.title: Great at doing its job
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 portable acs and this one probably the best for cooling. Ofcourse all of them make noise guys if you don't want noise get a unit installed. I highly recommend. It is heavy so not easy to transport but again as far as cooling goes, it's the best I've tried. There is no water
customer_reviews.author: Abc

customer_reviews.title: Lovely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Love it love it love it works perfectly 😍 Very good ac. Makes the room cold in a few minutes
customer_reviews.author: Ibrar

customer_reviews.title: Not working at all
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the unit is not working. After 15s it switches off with error on the screen. Very hard to deal with Amazon to arrange collection through the website (app) of this 32kg unit. Very disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Cools quickly
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably quiet and cools much quicker than my other aircon. Small, but efficient. Wish it had a ‘slim’ end for the hose to stick out the window, which our other device had. All in all very happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: PE

customer_reviews.title: Brings temperature down quickly
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this for a year now and have nothing but good to say about it. Our house has dorma windows and our bedroom gets stupidly hot. Even on 28-30 degree days, we couldn’t drop the heat at night below 30 degrees so this is a game changer. We don’t leave it on for hours, it chills the room quickly and brings it down to a comfortable temperature to sleep in. The noise is bearable and it’s slim enough to live in the corner of the room all year round. It is quick heavy but it wheels between rooms ok.
customer_reviews.author: Nik P

customer_reviews.title: Worked well during a tough week
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Olympia 8000 BTU air conditioning unit just before a week long heatwave hit the UK. The unit worked perfectly, managed to reduce the temperature by a couple of degrees (30 to 27) when placed in the master bedroom with the door open so helped cool the landing and second and third bedrooms..which was enough to make it more bearable but most importantly reduced the humidity to a comfortable level. I paid just over £250 and I feel it was worth the money so happy with the purchase. Build quality was fine and I personally didn’t feel it was overly noisy..
customer_reviews.author: Mr G J STEVENS

customer_reviews.title: Heats more than it cools
customer_reviews.text: This is the first air conditioning unit I've brought that's not not fit for purpose. It seems its main purpose is to make alot of noise and use a lot of power and generate heat. During operation the sides of the unit are almost too hot to touch. Do not buy this unit, It does not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the quietest Air cooler, Keeps the room at a steady temperature . My Room is quiet a size and I put it on and straight away it starts to make a difference. It also lets you know what temperature the room is , even when the cooler is off. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this didn't work. Very noisy which we expected but within minutes it would just switch itself off. The fan option didn't work either. Disappointed but have sent it back. Once refunded I shall purchase a different one. Mostly bought as I can afford it at the moment, but for use next year. Was hoping to test it out the last couple of days with the last bit of good heat here in the south/east.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Lawes

customer_reviews.title: A good portable air con unit
customer_reviews.text: First its a portable air con unit, they are noisy - if you need quiet you need to spend the money and get a split unit with noisy part outside. As a portable unit its a reasonable noise level. A nice remote control with decent control options, I use with an ir remote extender and it works fine but I did have to use manual to work out where receiver is as its not visible. Its quite compact but exhaust hose does add to space needed (probably more than you think if you are new to portable air con units) Very happy with this unit and it cools well.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed with this product and not worth buying. Unless ur sitting right in front of it it does make any difference.
customer_reviews.author: Zahra Lary

customer_reviews.title: Faulty from the beginning
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work. I have have received it and when I plugged it in nothing happened, no sound nor the display did anything. Faulty from the beginning. 0 stars if possible
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad Alkhalaf

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hot humid days / nights
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant ! , it may sem expensive but it works so well . When you compare it to fans there is no comparison . Lovely size , not to big or small and the remote control is a very good added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Lotty

customer_reviews.title: It needs draining
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as no water tank - condensate goes out of exhaust hose. Not so. There is a drain plug and the machine beeps when it needs emptying.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette Clements

customer_reviews.title: Not so loud I can't sleep with it on, and its very cold. Thats a win in my book
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to set up, it works well, it cools the room to chill and I can have it on all night If I wanted it. I don't run it all night tho, I tend to put it on as I go upstairs and by the time im actually in bed the room is cold. Then turn it off and have a nice sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Does not live up to expectations
customer_reviews.text: This machine promised to be quiet. It isn't remotely quiet. Measured sound is a lot louder than claimed. It promised to dispose of condensation in AC mode, so why do I have to drain the condensate when I've only used it in AC mode? It cooled one room to a fairly satisfactory level, but the apparently false claims about its performance don't match the price you pay. Knock £80 off and it might be more in line with what you get.
customer_reviews.author: G. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Great to beat the heat
customer_reviews.text: Our flat gets a lot of sun, without this thing it was over 30 inside when it was 23 outside, after switching it on it's a nice cool 19 degrees and I can finally sleep without pouring a bucket of water over my head. Best purchase I made this year.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Mahon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: On a hot day having a cold room to crawl into is priceless. it impresses everyone to walk in and find a cool space to eat drink and relax in. it costs a lot of money it can be a little noisy it may cost a bit to run but if you have to function well in heat then a place out of the heat is really needed and this little machine is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: I. Yardley

customer_reviews.title: very efficient
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product and great value for money. only one down side - the outlet hose is extremely large and cumbersome and is not easy to utilise on normal opening windows. It also could be longer which would help. However that apart it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Bob G

customer_reviews.title: doesn't seem to cool our 3m x 5m room
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to cool our log cabin as it gets really hot in the summer. I ran this for 4 hours continuously last week, on a day when it wasn't too sunny outdoors, and the room wasn't cooled at all, despite the extractor being fitted. If you stand in front of the unit, it does blow cold air out and have a cooling effect, but it doesn't affect the temperature of the room in my opinion, making it more of an air cooler than an air conditioning unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Effective But Noisy
customer_reviews.text: It throws out plenty of cool air but it really is horribly noisy. That's what air con units do, they make noise. TBH it was not a good buy for me and I would advise others to just get through the heatwaves, cooler weather will surely come.
customer_reviews.author: Old Timer

customer_reviews.title: Quoted Min Temperature is incorrect
customer_reviews.text: In the Product Catalogue pdf shown in the listing it says you can set a minimimum temperature of 16 degrees which is the main reason we bought this machine. It is incorrect. The minimum temperature is 17 degrees. Very annoyed
customer_reviews.author: R HARROP

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I wish the extractor pipe was longer. Too heavy. Had to use a bar table as a stand. Bought it for my dog. He’s very happy in his very large room. Cools in minutes . Happy 😊
customer_reviews.author: Yogi&me

customer_reviews.title: The best cooler
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This air conditioner is amazing,very low noise...and easy to install,is making the room like a refrigerator is less then 30min Is the best air conditioner I tottaly recommended this! Number 1
customer_reviews.author: Zeta

customer_reviews.title: Check for adjustable vents!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This unit is let down by not having adjustable air vents, which for me was enough to not use it for the purpose I wanted it for (never knew this at time of order) For cooling a closed room it works well but is noisy. If being ordered through Amazon prime it’s not next day as I expected it took about 6 weeks with me chasing all the time and everyone blaming everyone else. Overall it will cool a room but I would not buy again. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Skinnycraig

customer_reviews.title: Can't handle London's heat
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, it can't handle the heat (temperatures over 25oC). We kept it in a 12sq meter room, with 1 door-window that faces the sun for 6h a day. Even with the blinds closed, the room feels like a sauna.
customer_reviews.author: Marcio

customer_reviews.title: Compact good quality unit
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a good compact quality unit with a good range of options on the remote. Is a little noisy but so are all air conditioners.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product that really does keep the room cool
customer_reviews.text: Excellent with clear and simple instructions. Not having to collect and pour away condensed water, as with old machine, is fantastic improvement. Only gripe was lack of any information on guarantee. I tried finding out. Amazon Prime no use and Optima have promised to call back but are yet to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Hilly

customer_reviews.title: Great for bed rooms and smaller areas!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a bad unit, I had hoped it would keep the living room cool but it is not powerful enough for larger areas. It is ideal for a bedroom where it has now been placed, but is too noisy to sleep with on.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Foster

customer_reviews.title: Quietest aircon I have ever used !
customer_reviews.text: This unit is without a doubt the quietest unit I have ever used ..... and I have had many. Works well for a small room.
customer_reviews.author: Leon Nash

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and compact
customer_reviews.text: This unit is brilliant great value for money very powerful but compact comes with plenty of attachments for venting and good hose length. We use at home and also at static caravan would not hesitate to recommend this unit 5 star
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Burton on Trent

customer_reviews.title: needs head room to reach across a room
customer_reviews.text: the vent tube could be longer, if you want to pull the unit across room,certainly not silent
customer_reviews.author: betty

customer_reviews.title: Great AC unit
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased don’t understand your Stats against Warmth as it the opposite. Very good AC unit does a great job cooling down a room . Very heavy if you want to move downstairs. I am very happy with this AC unit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Design, noise could be a problem.
customer_reviews.text: Made in China. As with a lot of A/Cs around this price they tend to be noisy. The manual control buttons and LED has a very flimsy film to protect them, Nice design.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money and
customer_reviews.text: Cools really well. My only grip is you can’t change the direction of airflow
customer_reviews.author: E H

customer_reviews.title: Air conditioner cooler
customer_reviews.text: Great item very cool, great for summer, not flimsy like some of the other brands.
customer_reviews.author: shirley

customer_reviews.title: Good but loud
customer_reviews.text: Great little machine ice cold air but a bit noisy
customer_reviews.author: tracy

customer_reviews.title: The answer to all sleep problems
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I ever bought and it arrived on the first day of a heatwave. Wonderful! I now get a much better sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stops working and no one to help
customer_reviews.text: Item has stopped working after 1 month of hardly using it. Trying to reach amazon support is impossible. The instruction manual is not helpful. No one to speak to. Amazon support won't call me back after leaving my number to request a call.
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't cool a room
customer_reviews.text: What they don't tell you is pretty much everything that's wrong with it. Designed in Italy made in China - the worst combo on the planet.
customer_reviews.author: Someone

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product, I would recommend to people.
customer_reviews.text: It’s very good product. Glad I bought it. It’s my first purchase therefore I can’t tell whether the noise if loud or not!! I think any fan heater would give this much noise anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amandeep

customer_reviews.title: WELL MADE
customer_reviews.text: works very well, however you must keep all windows and doors shut
customer_reviews.author: William Heath

customer_reviews.title: cools brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptic at first but when all assembled and running i was amazed quieter than my old one cooler and soon cooled the room for my st Bernards would buy another no problem
customer_reviews.author: oscars mumAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product if you want to cool down but a bit noisy when fan on full
customer_reviews.text: for a cost effective general air conditioner this is great cools a reasonable size room in about 20mins and will get it cold a little after that
customer_reviews.author: Robert goodall

customer_reviews.title: This machine is product of China
customer_reviews.text: Is made in China, not made in Italy like they said. The machine's noise is terrible !
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Despite the draining problem, the air conditioner keeps the room very cool..
customer_reviews.text: It needs to be drained a couple of times a day. I have another brand of air conditioner that I have had for a year and have not needed to drain it even once.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Riddaway

customer_reviews.title: Great value air con unit
customer_reviews.text: A little bit noisy and quite heavy but that’s understandable. Really worked to cool our bedroom during the hot weather. Would recommend this product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H

customer_reviews.title: it is an Air Conditioning and needs vent
customer_reviews.text: it is an Air Conditioning and needs vent and it works very well
customer_reviews.author: Smiler

customer_reviews.title: Hose is short
customer_reviews.text: Great for Sliding and sash windows as has fixing kit for other windows vent is A bit short
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me cool
customer_reviews.text: Saved my life in this horrible summer. Being using it for 2 days now and so far it’s pretty good, does what it should do
customer_reviews.author: meytal Ben

customer_reviews.title: Quite Good price
customer_reviews.text: Quite , nice design and multi function I used it in home
customer_reviews.author: Salam602

customer_reviews.title: Efficient
customer_reviews.text: It gets the job done. The bedroom gets really cold.
customer_reviews.author: Ana A.

customer_reviews.title: Not Fit For Purpose !!!
customer_reviews.text: CONS: - The unit cannot handle the warm weather we are having & as a result it just blows warm air instead of cool. - The Remote Control is very basic & unresponsive, even when sitting 1 foot in front of the unit. - The Front Air Vent is fixed in an upward position & is non movable. - Adding Heat to an already hot room makes this item useless for me PROS: - None I cannot recommend this product I Hope This Review Helps
customer_reviews.author: D Mathis

customer_reviews.title: DEFINITELY WOULDN'T RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻
customer_reviews.text: With temperatures soaring in the past few years, where I live the house gets stuffy, so getting some kind of air conditioning has become a must. I bought this to try remedy this. I picked this mainly for the silent system aspect. The conditioner itself is fairly good, but silent it’s not, it’s very loud, even in eco mode. It’s loud & vibrates allot so the noise aspect is a bit of an issue, but it does cool off the room. I think for the price, I did expect allot better. I wouldn’t really recommend this product if you wanted it running long term.
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work, awkward shape, poor design. It's hype - silent technology, blue air is overdone.
customer_reviews.text: This didn't work. The fan came on for less than a minute in all modes then faded and the unit stopped. It had been rested for more than 24 hours after delivery. The rather vague manual was difficult to make sense of. The error that came up didn't match the manual. The egg shale was difficult to handle. The extracted tube simply pressed onto the back and fell off if the unit was moved.
customer_reviews.author: mrs f garnham

customer_reviews.title: A very effective aircon for a small room
customer_reviews.text: Neat and compact. We struggled with the hose and bought an extension to fit a 'fanlight' window. Whilst not silent, the noise is almost entirely 'air-noise' from the fan(s). The compressor is almost inaudible when the fan is on full speed and certainly not intrusive. It proved amazingly effective in the recent heatwave, coping with external temperatures of 34 degrees C, even with substantial 'leakage' from the fanlight. We are now arranging to plumb the system into a wall vent, which should see the system even more effective.
customer_reviews.author: Skipper Tony

customer_reviews.title: excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: very happy with this product. Even in 33 degree heat its kept the room cool. I move it from the living room to the bedroom at night. Getting a decent night's sleep is so much easier with this. Yes it makes a noise but nothing worse than a fan in my opinion. With working from home this summer its essential. Would definitely recommend. I just bought a couple of window covers that unzip to put the hose through. Also it was a bargain at £250 when I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny3

customer_reviews.title: absolutely brilliant room air conditioner
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant Compact package unit cools really well .for this price you can't go wrong.easy to use .only thing is that fan speed can't be controlled. That's the only thing however it looks brilliant and well made .if you are looking for a budget air conditioner that does what it says then this is for you .all accessories also useful when trying to instal. First few minutes you might not feel any cool air out of it but don't worry it will .specs on remote also easy to use .on and off timer with led back-lit.
customer_reviews.author: wahid

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure we would be nice and cool by now... if it had turned up
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this over others specifically because of the faster delivery. It's never turned up and now we're stuck in limbo until the time ticks over sufficiently we can request a refund or a replacement... by the time it materialises (they use one of the usual suspect terrible courier companies) it'll be winter again.
customer_reviews.author: Sue.Denim

customer_reviews.title: Yes and no
customer_reviews.text: I have had this installed for a few months using the through wall vent, it works well my only criticism is noise level for home use, the noise level on fan setting is tolerable but on cool mode the compressor is load for in home, also it’s not really portable it’s a heavy chunk to get upstairs and install window piping.
customer_reviews.author: Mr R R Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: There was yet another horrendous heatwave this year, and being in central London just made it even worse! This aircon unit cooled my room down perfectly so at least at home I was very comfortable. It's definitely on the noisier side to have on during the night but I got some earplugs!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Allen

customer_reviews.title: great cooling for the money
customer_reviews.text: paid £360 for the 12k btu unit and so much better than my last 9k btu aircon. but best thing seems to be that it expels all moisture with the air exhaust and runs for hours on end without the need for a drainage hose. one downside is that you cant adjust the vertical trajectory of the air - it points 45 degrees up and that's your lot.
customer_reviews.author: Priory

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Very good product bit on noisy side but you get used to it cooling is excellent
customer_reviews.author: daniel morley

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I like that’s it’s very easy to use, light to move around and the noise level is bearable. Amazing coolness and is a nice compact shape.
customer_reviews.author: mrs n a ayache

customer_reviews.title: Good AC
customer_reviews.text: Very good. Very happy with it. Although could definitely have longer wire and duction. Bit loud as 64db but in silent mode is quiet. 4.7 stars of 5 )))
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product very quite
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product and compared to others very quite keeps my living room lovely and cool. Wasnt to great in a larger room like my kitching dinner. But great value and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Lisa Smart

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very effective and efficient. Had to adapt the outlet for a standard window.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Davies

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: The unit looks very nice and is really cool but wish that it had a slim hose head to fit inside the oval window slide
customer_reviews.author: Sawsan Albannai

customer_reviews.title: Pay it once, look after it for life!
customer_reviews.text: Made all the difference to our little studio flat! Still use it on a rainy day if it’s warm indoors. Highly recommend - proper air con so comes with a proper air con price tag! This size (9000) is right for a single room but our room is fairly large.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Roche

product_meta.title: Olimpia Splendid 01961 Dolceclima Compact 10 P Portable Air Conditioner Unit with Cooling, Fan, Dehumidifier 10.000 BTU/h, Gas R290, Design Made in Italy, White
feature_bullets: R290 Gas, the natural refrigerant with the lowest impact on global warming (GWP = 3)
User-friendly remote control and digital touch display. Quick and easy set of all functions: fan, dehumidification, auto, sleep and turbo.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars102 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
